headline: 2 Discounted Growth Stocks to Buy Like There's No Tomorrow
summary: Deckers owns two of the hottest footwear brands and has a long record of delivering market-beating returns.  Lululemon continues to grow faster than industry-leading athletic apparel brands.  Buying shares of growing companies for less than their worth is how great investors like Warren Buffett amassed a fortune.
